alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 9:33AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Valley and northwestern Sherman Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 933 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area to near Burwell to near Comstock to Mason City. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fort Hartsuff State Park around 945 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ord, Elyria, Loup City and Arcadia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
